mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.user_name, u.nick_name, -- 如果 article_like 表里有记录，返回 1，否则返回 0 IF(al.id IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) AS is_liked FROM article a LEFT JOIN `user` u ON a.user_id = u.id -- 拿着文章ID和当前用户ID去查点赞表 LEFT JOIN article_like al ON a.id = al.article_id AND al.user_id = #{currentUserId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (user_id, content, source, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{content}, #{source}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE article SET like_count = like_count - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND like_count > 0
